snippet: The challenge of writing regulations that put the Affordable Care Act’s requirements for employers into practice, and then getting computer systems to carry them out, proved too much, too soon.
abstract: The challenge of writing regulations that put the Affordable Care Act’s requirements for employers into practice, and then getting computer systems to carry them out, proved too much, too soon.

headline.main: Employer Mandate, Delayed by Paperwork (and Efforts to Reduce It)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
